skills.name: Improved Lay on Hands
rankDescription: Gives the target of your Lay on Hands spell a 15% bonus to their armor value from items for 2 min. In addition, the cooldown for your Lay on Hands spell is reduced by 10 min.

rankDescription: Increases your chance to resist Fear and Disorient effects by an additional 5%.
Increases your chance to resist Fear and Disorient effects by an additional 10%.

skills.name: Illumination
rankDescription: After getting a critical effect from your Flash of Light, Holy Light, or Holy Shock heal spell, gives you a 20% chance to gain Mana equal to the base cost of the spell.
After getting a critical effect from your Flash of Light, Holy Light, or Holy Shock heal spell, gives you a 40% chance to gain Mana equal to the base cost of the spell.
After getting a critical effect from your Flash of Light, Holy Light, or Holy Shock heal spell, gives you a 60% chance to gain Mana equal to the base cost of the spell.

rankDescription: Places a Blessing on the friendly target, reducing damage dealt from all sources by up to 10 for 5 min. In addition, when the target blocks a melee attack the attacker will take 14 Holy damage. Players may only have one Blessing on them per Paladin at any one time.

skills.name: Seal of Command
rankDescription:
Gives the Paladin a chance to deal additional Holy damage equal to 70% of normal weapon damage. Only one Seal can be active on the Paladin at any one time. Lasts 30 sec.

Unleashing this Seal's energy will judge an enemy, instantly causing 46.5 to 55.5 Holy damage, 93 to 102 if the target is stunned or incapacitated.

skills.name: Pursuit of Justice
rankDescription: Increases movement and mounted movement speed by 4%. This does not stack with other movement speed increasing effects.
Increases movement and mounted movement speed by 8%. This does not stack with other movement speed increasing effects.

skills.name: Eye for an Eye
rankDescription: All spell criticals against you cause 15% of the damage taken to the caster as well. The damage caused by Eye for an Eye will not exceed 50% of the Paladin's total health.
All spell criticals against you cause 30% of the damage taken to the caster as well. The damage caused by Eye for an Eye will not exceed 50% of the Paladin's total health.

rankDescription: Increases the damage done by your Retribution Aura by 25%.

skills.name: Sanctity Aura

skills.name: Vengeance
rankDescription: Gives you a 3% bonus to Physical and Holy damage you deal for 8 sec after dealing a critical strike from a weapon swing, spell, or ability.

skills.name: Repentance
rankDescription: Puts the enemy target in a state of meditation, incapacitating them for up to 6 sec. Any damage caused will awaken the target. Only works against Humanoids.
